summary: Project includes a single scoped UI patch for the QMY Token page (rename QTM→QMY, dynamic background, transparent yellow-styled windows, footer unchanged) and a current build blocked by a configuration error.
architectural_notes: Scope constraint: only modify the QMY Token page; all other pages/modules/features must remain unchanged.
known_issues: Build/rebuild fails with a configuration error; requires Caffeine team support or configuration fix before build can complete.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Gold 3D coin with “QMY” mark on a transparent background (qmy-coin-gold-3d-transparent.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Update the QMY Token page coin image reference to use a QMY coin asset (replace the current QTM coin image) and ensure all visible token naming on that page reflects “QMY” (not “QTM”).
Remove the QMY Token page’s black static background so the global dynamic background effect (the same effect used on other pages) is visible behind the page content.

Restyle all content “windows” (cards/sections) on the QMY Token page to be transparent/glass with very thin yellow borders and yellow typography, while keeping the page layout and content structure otherwise unchanged.
Keep the site footer component and its content intact and ensure no Caffeine references are added or reintroduced while applying this patch.
Do not modify any other page routes, modules, or functionality outside the QMY Token page patch scope.
Resolve the build-blocking configuration error so the project can successfully rebuild and publish with this patch applied.

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply safe scoped patch to QMY Token page: rename QTM→QMY, use dynamic background like other pages (no black), make windows transparent with thin yellow borders and yellow text, keep footer intact with no Caffeine references; do not change any other pages/features.
